text: Fiorella Gelli Mattheis (born February 10, 1988) is a Brazilian actress and presenter. She began her career in 2006 presenting a program on SportV channel, in 2007 gained prominence by playing Vivian in the 14th season of Young Hearts, and in 2013 she became famous for playing the scammer Velna on the sitcom Vai Que Cola. Fiorella dated judoc Flávio Canto and the football player Alexandre Pato. Mattheis was born in Petrópolis. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Title Role Notes 2006 Rolê SporTV Presenter 2007 Malhação Vivian Pimenta Season 14 2008 Guerra e Paz Flávia Episode: "Maníacos & Depressivos" Casos e Acasos Mariana Episode: 'A Nova Namorada" Faça a Sua História Manuela Episode: "A Rainha da Uva" 2009 A Favorita Cristal Episode: January 2 2009–2010 Vídeo Show Presenter 2009 Uma Noite no Castelo Vírginia Special for TV 2010 As Cariocas Carla Mendes Episode: "A Invejosa de Ipanema" Dores e Amores Dora Movie 2012 Fina Estampa Mysterious blonde Episode: "January 28 to March 2" Louco Por Elas Frida Episode: "November 6" 2013 Cine Hollíudy Girl in dreams Movie 2013–2019 Vai Que Cola Velna Potocení 2014 Big Hero 6 Honey Lemon Dubbing 2015 Vai Que Cola - O Filme Velna Potocení Movie 2016 O Último Virgem Débora Movie Tô Ryca Patrícia Movie 2018 Minha Vida em Marte Carol Movie Rua Augusta Mika 2019 Vai Que Cola - O Começo Velna Potocení Movie == References == == Other websites == * * Fiorella Mattheis on Instagram. * Official website * Blog Category:People from Petrópolis Category:Brazilian actors
